attributes.action: To make tiktok name accounts that constantly report ppl videos
attributes.additional_details:
We want tiktok and other social media to control troll accounts from constant harassing and report others for no reason, we want a safer environment on social media, we want tiktok and other social media platforms to have a human customer support team where ppl can go and ask for help and we want tiktok to have a human appeals team to deal with accounts. We want tiktik to stop kicking the victims out of tiktok instead of the bullies.
We want algerisms to stop on social media
attributes.background: We want tiktok to take responsibility for ppl getting attacked on there platform and when the victims defend themselves tiktok need to understand and offer help as ppl are starting to have mental health problems due to this. We want tiktok to monitor accounts that bully and constantly report others

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Legislate for social media bans for online hate, abuse or trolling offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591691
